title: When will other upcoming Blood Moon splash arts reveal?
body:
I'm so hype for Blood Moon Jhin and Talon splash arts after seeing Diana and Twisted Fate ones. Perfection is the only word i can describe them.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Just putting the final touches on both of them, soon!!
lmao yes. I set the Diana splash as my background.... looks awesome{{champion:34}}
